mapper.select: select id,material_id, pn, material_alias, association_status, sort, supplier_id, stencil_ids from t_export_material_config where id = #{id}
select id,material_id, pn, material_alias, association_status, sort, supplier_id, stencil_ids from t_export_material_config where pn = #{pn}
mapper.insert: insert into t_export_material_config(material_id, pn, material_alias, association_status, sort, supplier_id,stencil_ids) values (#{materialId}, #{pn}, #{materialAlias}, #{materialAssociation}, #{sort}, #{supplierId},#{stencilIds})

insert into t_export_material_config(material_id,pn, material_alias, association_status, sort, supplier_id,stencil_ids) values
(#{entity.materialId},#{entity.pn}, #{entity.materialAlias}, #{entity.materialAssociation}, #{entity.sort}, #{entity.supplierId},#{entity.stencilIds})

insert into t_export_material_config(material_id,pn, material_alias, association_status, sort, supplier_id,stencil_ids) values
(#{entity.materialId},#{entity.pn}, #{entity.materialAlias}, #{entity.materialAssociation}, #{entity.sort}, #{entity.supplierId},#{entity.stencilIds})
on duplicate key update pn = values(pn), material_alias = values(material_alias), association_status = values(association_status), sort = values(sort), supplier_id = values(supplier_id)
mapper.update:
update t_export_material_config
material_id = #{materialId},
pn = #{pn},
material_alias = #{materialAlias},
association_status = #{materialAssociation},
sort = #{sort},
supplier_id = #{supplierId},
stencil_ids = #{stencilIds},
where id = #{id}

update t_export_material_config
material_id = #{materialId},
pn = #{pn},
material_alias = #{materialAlias},
association_status = #{materialAssociation},
sort = #{sort},
supplier_id = #{supplierId},
stencil_ids = #{stencilIds},
where id = #{id}

update t_export_material_config
material_id = #{materialId},
pn = #{pn},
material_alias = #{materialAlias},
association_status = #{materialAssociation},
sort = #{sort},
supplier_id = #{supplierId},
stencil_ids = #{stencilIds},
where material_id = #{materialId}
